summary: An ordinance relating to the Engineering Department; creating therein effective October 1, 1954 certain positions and additional positions, fixing compensation, abolishing existing positions of Sewage Plant Foreman, Sewage Plant Operator and Maintenance Laborer, authorizing expenditures for certain betterments, making appropriation from the Emergency Fund, declaring the Emergency therefor and reimbursing the Emergency Fun from unexpended and unencumbered Salary Funds in the 1954 Budget and by appropriation from the City Street Fund.
